description:

title: Pastor launches armed citizen patrol after deadly shooting near his church, but not everyone is happy with the idea

description:
Some believe that the TikTok bill is an attack on Free Speech. Vivek Ramaswamy is one of those people. Rather than banning the app, he suggests we end ‚Äúall forced data transfers to the CCP, regardless of ownership.‚Äù

To be clear, he does believe there is a case to be made in regards to banning addictive social media for kids under the age of 16, and has been vocal about that for years. This would include TikTok.

"Ban the bad behavior, not the individual actor or the individual company because that sets a terrible precedent,‚Äù Ramaswamy said. ‚ÄúThat is a formula for abuse.‚Äù

He listed three primary problems of addictive algorithmic soc
title: Vivek Ramaswamy defends TikTok flip-flop: "A massive civil libertarian risk without any justice to address the concern"

description:
Children will no longer be prescribed puberty blockers by UK doctors, according to the National Health Service (NHS). Among those saying, "Yeah, that makes sense," is -- you guessed it -- the H.T.I.C. herself (Head "Transphobe" In Charge), JK Rowling.

Puberty blockers are drugs that "block puberty," such as breast development and facial hair. If you are someone who thinks you can choose your own gender, or an AWFL white mother who thinks her kids can, the drugs give you a chance to decide for yourself if you want to be a boy or a girl. Though with the sudden increase of people claiming they aren't the gender they were born,
title: UK follows the science and bans puberty blockers for minors, of course JK Rowling is dropping mics about it
